column1: gerald dean westbrook| gerald dean westbrook. born: may 26
column7: 2015 at paris regional medical center. funeral services are set for 2:00 pm
column10: 2015 in the chapel of fry & gibbs funeral home with rev. john brown officiating. burial will follow in evergreen cemetery. the family will receive friends from 7:00-8:00 pm
column11: monday evening at the funeral home. fry & gibbs funeral home has charge of the arrangements. dean was born may 26
column12: 1926 in the glory community of lamar county
column13: texas to coy and mittie hunter westbrook. he married emma lorene nix on july 19
column16: 2006. he was retired after 32 years from general motors in arlington
column17: texas. he served his country in the us army during world war ii. he was a member of ramseur baptist church. survivors include his daughter
column22: texas and ryan manns of mansfield. he was preceded in death by his parents and two brothers
column23: thomas and robert westbrook. pallbearers will be melvin white
